headline.main: MANUFACTURER NOW SAYS SMOKING WON'T MEAN AUTOMATIC DISMISSAL

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Employees of the USG Acoustical Products Corporation will not necessarily be dismissed if they violate a widely publicized smoking ban and some will not be affected at all, a company spokesman said Tuesday.
docs.snippet: LEAD: Employees of the USG Acoustical Products Corporation will not necessarily be dismissed if they violate a widely publicized smoking ban and some will not be affected at all, a company spokesman said Tuesday.
